inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiology physical status 1 or 2
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiology (ASA) physical status ≥ 3
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy or hypersensitivity to amide type local anaesthetics;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Receiving opioids or tranquilizers for > 1 week preoperatively;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of alcohol or drug abuse.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 5 months old male patient with undescended testis, no developmental delay. Diagnostic laparoscopy showed an abdominal undescended testis.
